(APOLOGIZE, for what?  Yes, interesting section!  Reminds me of something you 
did earlier now that my mind is working and I see something.  But anyway, I'm 
not going to apologize to you.  There's nothing to apologize with.  How did I 
mode?  How many times do I have to ask you that?  Firing from a rifle, and my 
character's optic lasers?  That's not moding.  I hope you don't think that.  
Every battle, and every time when I kick your people down easy, you start 
whining, saying I moded.  Well, everytime we ask you to show proof!  And you 
never do!  YOU SKIP THAT ENTIRE SUBJECT!  Why?  Because I didn't do anything. 
 Now, if I did, show me, and I'll apologize.  I hate to mode.  It ticks me 
off because I've worked hard to not mode at all.

You say I did something with the maximum fire rate?  Be more specific!  I 
can't go on "you fired more than the maximum rate" or similar stuff to that.  
Man, I'm this close to seceding from the Alliance and going on a killing 
spree. (That's actually a bad sentence, since you can't see my fingers, but 
my fuse is running low, and if pushed, I will explode).

Proof.  I've seen none.  You haven't commented on it.  Stop whining OOC.  
It's irritating.  I'm fed up with it.  Take your defeat with some dignity.  
No one likes a sore loser)


Lord Unitron
KSLawDogg@...
